Column.Name: RemotePC
Column.Description: Status of the remote PC (board computer)

Column.Name: StopRequestedState
Column.Description: Set to 1 when stop was requested, otherwise 0

Column.Name: DoorStatus
Column.Description: Status of the door: 0 = closed; 1 = open

Column.Name: SpecialInput
Column.Description: Special input set to 1 when enabled, 0 when disabled

Column.Name: ExitSide
Column.Description: Exit side: 0 = unknown; 1 = right; 2 = left; 3 = both

Table.Name: PagingStatus
Table.Description: Table containing the page number and number of pages used in paging, these values are generated by the Composer, not by Protran. Don't change these values since they are hardcoded in the Composer!

Column.Name: SpecialLine
Column.Description: Special line symbol; from Infomedia 2.0 on, this is just the special line character

Column.Name: ApproachingStop
Column.Description: Flag whether the bus is approaching the next stop (e.g. 100m before stop), set to 1 when approaching, otherwise 0

Column.Name: Deviation
Column.Description: Information if the vehicle is deviating from its planned route

Column.Name: DestinationTransferSymbols
Column.Description: Transfer symbols for the destination stop

Column.Name: DestinationPlatform
Column.Description: Platfrom at which the vehicle arrives

Column.Name: ShowLineNumber
Column.Description: Show line number coming for destination or not

Column.Name: StopPlatform
Column.Description: Platfrom at which the vehicle arrives

Column.Name: StopDistanceToNext
Column.Description: Distance to the next stop in meters

Table.Name: Connections
Table.Description: Table containing connection information for a single stop.

Column.Name: ConnectionDestinationName
Column.Description: Name of the destination stop of the connection

Column.Name: ConnectionDestinationCity
Column.Description: Name of the destination city of the connection

Column.Name: ConnectionVia
Column.Description: Name of the important intermediate (via) stops of the connection

Column.Name: ConnectionPlatform
Column.Description: Name of the platform of the connection

Column.Name: ConnectionDelay
Column.Description: Delay information about the connection (e.g. +5 min)

Table.Name: ConnectionReference
Table.Description: Information about the stop for which Connections are to be shown.

Column.Name: ConnectionReferenceStopPlatform
Column.Description: Platfrom at which the vehicle arrives

Column.Name: ConnectionReferenceStopDistanceToNext
Column.Description: Distance to the next stop in meters

Column.Name: MessageType
Column.Description: Type of the message (e.g. to show a special symbol depending on the type)

Table.Name: InfoTainmentVolumeSettings
Table.Description: InfoTainment Volume Settings used in the Audio Hardware switch and returned to external equipment InfoTainment

Column.Name: AudioStatusRefreshInterval
Column.Description: The auto refresh interval for the audio hardware switch to send Audio Status over the serial port. Zero to disable, default 1000 ms

Table.Name: InfoTainmentCannedMsgPlay
Table.Description: InfoTainment Canned Message Info dictionary definitions.

Column.Name: CannedMessageID
Column.Description: ID corresponding to the Canned Message on the MCU

Column.Name: CannedMessageZone
Column.Description: Audio Zone defined for the Canned Message: None = 0, Interior = 1; Exterior = 2, Both = 3

Column.Name: CannedMessageEncoding
Column.Description: Encoding used for the Canned Message: WAV = 4; MP3 = 5 NOTE: This is currently Not Used

Column.Name: CannedMessageFileName
Column.Description: The File name of the resource

Table.Name: NetworkChangedMessage
Table.Description: Network connection changed event. Example Wifi network connected

Column.Name: Connected
Column.Description: 1 to indicate a network connection exists else 0.

Table.Name: NetworkFileAccessSettings
Table.Description: Network shared folder settings for external hardware to map to the master display.

Column.Name: Uri
Column.Description: URI to access external files as a shared folder or as ftp. Such as file://192.168.0.1/SharedFolderPath, or ftp://192.168.0.2/ftpFolderPath

Table.Name: InfoTainmentAudioStatus
Table.Description: Audio Status to be sent to external equipment(InfoTainment) via Ximple protocol by Protran.

Column.Name: AudioActive
Column.Description: 1: audio is active, 0: audio is inactive

Column.Name: PttActive
Column.Description: 1: driver PTT is active, 0: driver PTT is inactive

Column.Name: LineInActive
Column.Description: 1: line-in is active, 0: line-in is inactive

Column.Name: CannedMsgActive
Column.Description: 1: canned message is active, 0: canned message is inactive

Column.Name: PttLocked
Column.Description: 1: PTT is locked out, 0: PTT is not locked

Column.Name: TestActive
Column.Description: 1: audio test is active, 0: audio test is inactive

Column.Name: InteriorActive
Column.Description: 1: interior audio is active, 0: interior audio is inactive

Column.Name: ExteriorActive
Column.Description: 1: exterior audio is active, 0: exterior audio is inactive

Column.Name: SunUp
Column.Description: the state of the sun for the vehicle location, 1 - up, 0 - down

Column.Name: ProximityEnter
Column.Description: the vehicle has entered a proximity (includes an id)

Column.Name: ProximityExit
Column.Description: the vehicle has left a proximity (includes an id)

Column.Name: VehicleId
Column.Description: the id of the vehicle this unit is running on

Column.Name: MinuteUpdate
Column.Description: sent when minute changes, contains the current minute

Column.Name: HourUpdate
Column.Description: sent when the hour changes, contains the current hour

Column.Name: RouteState
Column.Description: Infotransit Location Awareness Module(LAM) route state, 0=Boot, 1=SmartTrip, 2=GoingToDeparture, 3=WaitingAtDeparture, 4=OnRoute, 7=OutOfService, 8=AtDestination

Column.Name: ActiveProximityId
Column.Description: the vehicle has entered a proximity (includes an id)

Column.Name: Text
Column.Description: the adhoc text to add to the presentation

Column.Name: Type
Column.Description: the adhoc type string Information, Emergency

Column.Name: StartDate
Column.Description: the adhoc start date and time

Column.Name: EndDate
Column.Description: the adhoc end date and time

Column.Name: VehicleId
Column.Description: the adhoc vehicleId that applies or empty if NA

Column.Name: Route
Column.Description: the adhoc route that applies or empty if NA

Column.Name: Destinations
Column.Description: the adhoc destinations, comma delimited or empty if NA
